title: MLVET - Machine Learning Video Editing Tool
shortDescription: An offline desktop video editing application that uses ML-generated transcripts to allow editing video as text.
fullDescription: MLVET is an innovative desktop application that revolutionizes video editing by allowing users to edit video content through text manipulation. Using machine learning-generated transcripts, the application enables intuitive text-based editing where changes to the transcript automatically reflect in the video timeline.
highlights: Edit video by modifying ML-generated transcripts
Full-year Software Engineering capstone project with 17-person team
Served as Release Train Engineer under SAFe framework
Designed UI/UX in Figma and managed builds/releases
Offline desktop application with cross-platform support

detailedContent.overview: MLVET revolutionizes video editing by enabling text-based editing through ML-generated transcripts. Users can edit video content by simply modifying the transcript text, with changes automatically reflected in the video timeline. Developed as a full-year capstone project with a 17-person Agile team using the SAFe framework.
